places_with_reviews.name: Ranamandala Anjaneya Swamy Temple- Adoni

reviews.text: Ranamandala Anjaneya Swamy Temple in Adoni is a revered site dedicated to Lord Hanuman. Known for its spiritual ambiance and distinctive architecture, the temple draws devotees seeking blessings and a peaceful space for prayer and reflection, contributing significantly to Adoni's religious landscape.

Super place to visit, u have shelter to rest on the way to top of the hill. Senior citizens can also attempt as the steps are suitable for their climb. Vehicle can be parked near the arch from wr step starts.
May your wishes come true after ur visit!

A must visit pilgrimage destination in Adoni. One can reach the temple via Yellamma Konda road and take steps the reach the shrine on top of the hill. The view from the Hilltop is mesmerising and perfectly picturesque. The temple has great historical importance and is very powerful.  Devotees from neighbouring villages also visit the temple during Shravana Maasa. The main deity doesn't have a roof overhead. The Anjaneya Swamy murti is 6feet tall and is covered by sindhur.There are small temples of Ayyappa, Rama, Lakshmana, sit a and Shiva on the hilltop.

One of the best places to visit if you are a lord Hanuman devotee.. The lord the journey and the surrounding will give much needed boost to your mind... Peaceful, beautiful and devotional place located in Adoni.
Must visit in the early morning open air with family and friends. Hanuman lord blessing ❤️

places_with_reviews.name: Shahi Jamia Masjid - شاہی جامع مسجد
places_with_reviews.address: shahi jamia masjid, PN Rd, Old Town, Adoni, Andhra Pradesh 518301, India

reviews.text:
This place I visited on 4/Apr/2022(Roja ramjan time)when I went inside the masjid every one is busy in cleaning and sweeping,
In praying hall on top sealing paintings and crafting of walls are good, freely praying hall capacity is around 500 devotees.when iam watching the masjid interrior suddenly one of the person came and asked my name(I told my name),after knowing my name he  asked me to leave the namaz place in polite manner(I asked why),he indicated his for head( it's because I didn't wear any cap),and he suggested that those who pray namaz should enter to prayer hall.then I understand the situation and left the masjid quitly with disappointment and took some of the pictures from outside

Most importantly walls of the masjid out side looks like walls of old temples.
when you entering into masjid on left side I saw some of the pillers resembles hindu temple pillers ,when I went into the structure i saw hiden doors and closed wall back side of the structure.
That structure alloted to storing some old utensils
Most shoking thing is when I try to go inside temple like  structure, some of the workers' restricted me to go to inside the structure.
(i concluded that this place is not visitable for all relegion and cast,if you want to visit go by walk ,no place for parking and walking)
It is the oldest mosque in Adoni (AP) and one of the most beautiful masjid which is very unique in style with very good architecture truely well maintained.

This place Shahi Jamia masjid since 1667 in era of hazarth Aurangazeb radiallahu anhu and it is built by siddi Masood khan sab beautiful architecture, more over first imamat is sarkar Taher sha khadri rehmatula alaih which was rested in out of town' - Taher sha khadri dargah way(ranmandala konda road) thankful for these companions for Adoni pride and peaceful
Mostly proud to be Muslim Ummah (Sunni) this is our SHAAN
Amazing architecture and well maintained place of worship. Visited during the year 2012.

One Of the Most Beautiful mosque in Adoni
#Historical mosque Constructed by Siddiq masood Kha

places_with_reviews.name: Sri Yellamma Avva Temple

reviews.text:
The temple of EKAVEERA MATHA, LORD PARASHURAAMA 's mother RENUKA YELLAMMA.

Very powerful dity in Hindu mythology, treated as Avatar of GODESSES PARVATHI & her husband JAMADAGNI as LORD SHIVA.

And son PARASHURAAMA as AVATARA of LORD VISHNU. Trinity in one family.

LORD PARASHURAAMA is an disciple of GURU DATTATREYA, who is an TRINITY himself in an single person.

LORD PARASHURAAMA is because he is one of the SAPTA CHIRANJIVI, who will live little the beginning of the next KALPA.

He will be the master of KALKI, the forthcoming DASHA AVATAR.

As per the SHALIVAHANA SHAKA ERA in 1976 LORD PARUSHU RAAMA will find KALKI.

JAI GURU DATTATREYA MAHARAJ JI KI.
This is privileged place to visit and once in a year in July month huge number people of vist here and we can find trains from guntakallu junction
This place is with good atmosphere and temple....Lots of people are visited during weekends
It is famous temple in adoni,it is placed in hill area,we can experience good with nature

places_with_reviews.name: Amba Bhavani Temple
places_with_reviews.address: J7MF+9PJ, Amba Bhavani Pet, Marati street, Adoni, Andhra Pradesh 518301, India

reviews.text: Super nice temple This is a marriage special temple
No separate review needed, It is my home town and been visited temple many times for major ocassion. Jai Bhavani

No words to describe the beauty and glory of this old magnificent temple.The main deity Amba Bhavani accompanied by Shiva, Ganesha, Rukmini sametha Panduranga, Jiveshwara Maharaj Dattatreya, Ram Lakshmana Sita with Hanuman, Garuda,Navagraha and Krishna makes this a spiritually special place. Located in the Forest area of Adoni town, this temple has great significance for Swakula Sali community.
Good and peaceful place to deities
